images.copyright: Acadia National Park in Maine, USA (© emptyclouds/Getty Images)
images.title: 'The Crown Jewel of the North Atlantic'
images.caption: 'The Crown Jewel of the North Atlantic'
images.desc: Welcome to Acadia National Park on Maine's rocky, scenic coast on the northernmost state of USA. The 49,075-acre park covers about half of Mount Desert Island, smaller nearby islands, and a section on the US mainland. The oldest US national park east of the Mississippi River and the only one in the state of Maine, Acadia packs a lot of geographical variety into its relatively small size. You'll find kilometres of craggy coastline like the shore in our homepage image, woodlands, wetlands, and mountains. The park's Cadillac Mountain is the highest point along the North Atlantic seaboard and a great spot to take in the sunrise.

tooltips.walle: ఈ చిత్రం వాల్‌పేపర్‌గా డౌన్‌లోడ్ చేయడానికి అందుబాటులో లేదు.
tooltips.walls: ఈ చిత్రాన్ని డౌన్‌లోడ్ చేయండి. ఈ చిత్రం వినియోగం వాల్‌పేపర్‌కి మాత్రమే పరిమితం చేయబడింది.
